p: Osteoarthritis (OA) is a leading causes of global disability, and the number of people affected is anticipated to substantially increase over the coming decades [ 1]. Osteoarthritis at the knee joint, the most commonly involved lower limb site, can cause pain and physical dysfunction and impaired quality of life. There is no cure for knee OA, and to date, most research has focused on treatments to alleviate pain and prevent functional decline.
